author: foxnews.com
title: Trump Changed His Stance On Immigration | Alan Colmes Radio Show
text: Wednesday on “The Alan Colmes Show” Alan talked to Gaby Pacheco Program Director of The Dream.US about her last meeting with Donald Trump. Gaby told Alan that she and the DREAMERS met with Donald Trump who said “You convinced me” after listening to their personal stories and how it’s a far cr
